# The `BlockCoverageInference.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file finds the minimum set of blocks on a CFG that must be instrumented to infer execution coverage for the whole graph. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file finds the minimum set of blocks on a CFG that must be instrumented to infer execution coverage for the whole graph.
